title: SwitchBack
description: When travel writer and werewolf Ashlee Scott returns to her hometown to recuperate from a shooting, she must confront a place full of painful and pleasant memories while dealing with her identical twin sister Amber and the complications of family. Throw in the full moon, old boyfriends, old ghosts and old enemies, and Knightsbridge Canyon will never be the same for her again.
author: Drew VanDyke
